metadata.name: BIG HUGS
metadata.description:
Without distinction, we all need to stop and hug, even for a moment. For peace and our futureâ€¦

When we hug, our body begins to secrete the hormone oxytocin. After the hormone is released, we become happy and feel good. And we begin to connect with the other person. In addition, the secreted oxytocin hormone activates the immune system.

This piece represents a big hug digitally. Big hugs to whoever is looking at this piece...
